s.text: 7. Which elements of Monica's story suggest she is given to telling the truth?
Her mother, Marcia Lewis (a k a Lewinsky), a former Hollywood Reporter reporter, wrote a book about "The Private Lives of the Three Tenors."
In the cover blurb, to help sell books, she teasingly suggests that she had an affair with Placido Domingo.
6. Would Jordan have helped Monica get a job at Revlon if he knew a) she was about to perjure herself at his request and b) his help could be construed as a bribe to facilitate the perjury?
For example, getting her a lawyer, who, like all lawyers, would let her know her full scenario of options.
